heading: Bailey Family Fund awards $194,500
paragraph: The Bernard F. and Melissa Anne Bailey Family Fund awarded $194,500 in scholarships to 99 healthcare students for 2025–26, continuing its legacy since 2005.

heading: IET India extends scholarship deadline
paragraph: IET India has extended the application deadline for its 9th Scholarship Award to June 22, 2025.

heading: Huron County skilled trade scholarships
paragraph: Two Huron County seniors each received $1,000 scholarships from the SET SEG Foundation to pursue skilled trades.

heading: Saratoga Builders Association awards scholarships
paragraph: Two $1,000 scholarships awarded to local students pursuing construction industry careers.

heading: Vexus Fiber awards 31 scholarships
paragraph: Vexus Fiber awarded $3,000 each to 31 graduates in rural districts through its scholarship program.

heading: Azim Premji Foundation launches Rs 2,250 Cr scholarship
paragraph: Supporting 250K girls over 3 years in India for higher education, starting in 2025–26.

heading: Illinois Sheriffs’ Association awards $58K
paragraph: 113 students across Illinois received scholarships totaling over $58,000 for 2025–26.

heading: Cam Jordan Foundation full-tuition awards
paragraph: Four Louisiana high school seniors won full‑tuition scholarships plus mentorship and laptops.

heading: Delhi govt grants ₹19 Cr to 1,305 students
paragraph: Over 1,300 Delhi university students received scholarships worth ₹19 Cr under a new scheme.

heading: 32 US Rhodes Scholars named
paragraph: The 2025 cohort includes students involved in social impact, asylum support, and more.

heading: Full‑tuition scholarships nearing deadlines
paragraph: Gates Scholarship, Breakthrough Junior Challenge, QuestBridge and more have upcoming deadlines in Sep 2025.

heading: Edvisors $2.5K monthly scholarship
paragraph: Edvisors offers monthly $2,500 no‑essay awards with deadline June 2025.

heading: Sallie offers $2K no‑essay scholarship
paragraph: Students can apply for a monthly $2,000 scholarship from Sallie with no essay.

heading: Niche $15K no‑essay scholarship
paragraph: Niche is offering a $15,000 no‑essay scholarship, deadline June 10, 2025.

heading: Geoscience IDEA $5K scholarship
paragraph: Encouraging women in geoscience with a $5,000 award. Deadline June 30, 2025.

heading: Dr Pepper $100K tuition giveaway
paragraph: A chance to win up to $100,000 in tuition support; deadline end‑Sep 2025.

heading: Rhodes Scholarship $250K award
paragraph: Prestigious Rhodes Scholarship offers up to $250,000 for study at Oxford; deadline Oct 2, 2025.

heading: QuestBridge full‑ride scholarships
paragraph: QuestBridge National College Match offers full‑ride awards worth $325,000; deadline Sep 26, 2025.

heading: Coca‑Cola Scholars $20K award
paragraph: $20,000 achievement‑based award; deadline Sept 30, 2025.

heading: Evans Caddie Scholarship $120K
paragraph: Evans Scholars full‑tuition and housing up to $120K; deadline Oct 15, 2025.
